Paspọtụ African Union bụ akwụkwọ paspọtụ a na-ahụkarị nke a na-etinye iji dochie paspọtụ steeti ndị otu African Union na-enye ma na-ewepụ ndị na-ebu visa ọ bụla maka steeti 55 niile dị n'Africa.Ọ malitere na Julaị 17, 2016, na nnọkọ nkịtị nke iri abụọ na asaa nke African Union nke emere na Kigali na Rwanda site n'aka onye isi ala Rwanda Paul Kagame na onye isi ala Chad Idriss Deby nwụrụ anwụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2018, a na-eme atụmatụ ka a gbasaa paspọtụ ahụ ma dịrị njikere maka iji ya mee ihe n'ókèala ụwa site na 2020, agbanyeghị na a na-egbu oge ịmalite ya na 2021.
E nwere ụdị paspọtụ African Union atọ a ga-enye:
.Paspọtụ ahụ nwere ihe edere n'asụsụ Arabic, Bekee, French, Portuguese na Swahili.  A na-ebipụta egwu egwu African Union na ibe ozugbo e mechara ibe foto a.
